Detailed Description

Test XMF parser, DLS parser, SongPlayer.

Author:
Robert Marsanyi, Phil Burk, Copyright 2005 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL
Tests include:
  • checking that good files parse correctly
  • checking that bad files return appropriate errors
  • checking that in all cases there are no memory leaks.

    The datafiles are specifically munged to test different aspects of the different parsers. NOTE: these tests expect to find specific test data files in a directory QADATA_DIR, which is defined by qa_common.h.
